block.p: REISNER-Selma, on May 11th, 2000, at age 91. Beloved wife of the late Adolph Reisner. Loving mother of Nancy Schlick and Henry Reisner, mother-in-law of Lynn Reisner and the late Larry Schlick, grandmother of Carla Valentino, Erica Payne, Robert Schiffmann, Jr., Brad Reisner & Alison Reisner, great-grandmother of Robert and Douglas Payne. Services on Sunday, May 14th, at Congregation Mt. Sinai, 250 Cadman Plaza West, Brooklyn Heights, New York. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to the American Cancer Society or Cancer Care.
